articles.title: NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day 9 June 2023: Webb Telescope snaps Pandora Cluster - HT Tech
articles.description: Today’s NASA Astronomy Picture of the Day is a snapshot of Abell 2744, also known as the Pandora’s Cluster of galaxies which is located about 4 billion light-years away towards the constellation of Sculptor.
